bibl.title: with a contribution on the Egyptian texts by Eugene Cruz-Uribe, Syene I. The Figural and Textual Graffiti from the Temple of Isis at Aswan.

series.title: Beiträge zur ägyptischen Bauforschung und Altertumskunde.

bibl.note: Preface. - General introduction. - Part I. Figural graffiti (Nos 1-179). - Part II. Textual graffiti (Nos 180-352) [Nos 180-296 are Hieroglyphic and Demotic texts; Nos 297-314 are Greek and Demotic texts; Nos 315-352 are modern texts]. - Pp. 167-169: Appendix I: Boat graffiti from a late antique quay wall at Elephantine (Nos 353-356). - Bibliography. Indices.
bibl.seg: Dijkstra Jiste H.F., with a contribution on the Egyptian texts by Eugene Cruz-Uribe, Syene I. The Figural and Textual Graffiti from the Temple of Isis at Aswan. (Beiträge zur ägyptischen Bauforschung und Altertumskunde. 18.)
Darmstadt - Mainz, Ph. von Zabern, 2012, 4°, 216 pp., 20 figg., 36 pl. ISBN 978-3-8053-4395-4. €69,90.

Preface. - General introduction. - Part I. Figural graffiti (Nos 1-179). - Part II. Textual graffiti (Nos 180-352) [Nos 180-296 are Hieroglyphic and Demotic texts; Nos 297-314 are Greek and Demotic texts; Nos 315-352 are modern texts]. - Pp. 167-169: Appendix I: Boat graffiti from a late antique quay wall at Elephantine (Nos 353-356). - Bibliography. Indices.
